verses.verse: And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H559>said<s%> to me, and have made a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you.

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: and I am <S%H2204>old<s%> and gray <S%H7867>headed;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> are with you: and I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you from my <S%H5271>childhood<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> here I am: <S%H6030>witness<s%> against me <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5048>before<s%> his <S%H4899>anointed:<s%> <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken?<s%> or <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H2543>ass<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken?<s%> or <S%H4310>whom<s%> have I <S%H6231>defrauded?<s%> whom have I <S%H7533>oppressed?<s%> or of <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> have I <S%H3947>received<s%> any <S%H3724>bribe<s%> to <S%H5956>blind<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> therewith? and I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> it you.

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> You have not <S%H6231>defrauded<s%> us, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> us, <S%H3808>neither<s%> have you <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H3972>ought<s%> of any <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5707>witness<s%> against you, and his <S%H4899>anointed<s%> is <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you have not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3972>ought<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%> And they <S%H559>answered,<s%> He is <S%H5707>witness.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> It is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6213>advanced<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and that <S%H5927>brought<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3320>stand<s%> still, that I may <S%H8199>reason<s%> with you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6666>righteous<s%> acts of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H834>When<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> which <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and made them <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And when they <S%H7911>forgot<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> he <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> against them.

And they <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> We have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> and <S%H6252>Ashtaroth:<s%> but <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> you.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> and <S%H917>Bedan,<s%> and <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side,<s%> and you <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H983>safe.<s%>

And when you <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, you <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H3808>No;<s%> but a <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us: when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> was your <S%H4428>king.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H2009>behold<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> you have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> and <S%H4310>whom<s%> you have <S%H7592>desired!<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you.

<S%H518>If<s%> you will <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, and <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and not <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> then shall <S%H1571>both<s%> you and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> that <S%H4427>reigns<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you <S%H1961>continue<s%> <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> but <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> then shall the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be against you, as it was against your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H1571>therefore<s%> <S%H3320>stand<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Is it not <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> to <S%H3117>day?<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H4306>rain;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>perceive<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> that your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is <S%H7227>great,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in <S%H7592>asking<s%> you a <S%H4428>king.<s%>

So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H4306>rain<s%> that <S%H3117>day:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H6419>Pray<s%> for your <S%H5650>servants<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that we <S%H4191>die<s%> not: for we have <S%H3254>added<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H2403>sins<s%> this <S%H7451>evil,<s%> to <S%H7592>ask<s%> us a <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness:<s%> <S%H389>yet<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> not aside from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> but <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart;<s%>

And <S%H5493>turn<s%> you not aside: for then should you go <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8414>vain<s%> things, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3308>cannot<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5337>deliver;<s%> for they are <S%H8414>vain.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will not <S%H5203>forsake<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> for his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H5668>sake:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it has <S%H2974>pleased<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> you his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> as for me, God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that I should <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H2308>ceasing<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%> for you: but I will <S%H3384>teach<s%> you the <S%H2896>good<s%> and the <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H1870>way:<s%>

<S%H389>Only<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him in <S%H571>truth<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart:<s%> for <S%H7200>consider<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%> things he has done for you.
But <S%H518>if<s%> you shall still do <S%H7489>wickedly,<s%> you shall be <S%H5595>consumed,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> you and your <S%H4428>king.<s%>
